rule: The output may include misspellings and does not need to match exactly one of the category names: World, Sports, Business, or Sci/Tech.
complianceText:
The chatbot's output is empty, which does not provide a classification of the input text into one of the specified categories (World, Sports, Business, Sci/Tech). According to the description, the chatbot is expected to classify the input text, and an empty response fails to meet this requirement.
